member.name: IMFPluginControl.GetDisabledByIndex
member.summary: Gets a class identifier (CLSID) from the blocked list.
member.param: Member of the enumeration, specifying the type of object to enumerate.
The zero-based index of the CLSID to retrieve.
Receives the CLSID at the specified index.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The index parameter is out of range.

member.name: IMFPluginControl.GetPreferredClsid
member.summary: Searches the preferred list for a class identifier (CLSID) that matches a specified key name.
member.param: Member of the enumeration, specifying the type of object.
The key name to match. For more information about the format of key names, see the Remarks section of .
Receives a CLSID from the preferred list.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: No CLSID matching this key was found.

member.name: IMFPluginControl.GetPreferredClsidByIndex
member.summary: Gets a class identifier (CLSID) from the preferred list, specified by index value.
member.param: Member of the enumeration, specifying the type of object to enumerate.
The zero-based index of the CLSID to retrieve.

Receives the key name associated with the CLSID. The caller must free the memory for the returned string by calling the function. For more information about the format of key names, see the Remarks section of .
Receives the CLSID at the specified index.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The index parameter is out of range.

member.name: IMFPluginControl.IsDisabled
member.summary: Queries whether a class identifier (CLSID) appears in the blocked list.
member.param: Member of the enumeration, specifying the type of object for the query.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The specified CLSID appears in the blocked list.
The specified CLSID is not in the blocked list.

member.name: IMFPluginControl.SetDisabled
member.summary: Adds a class identifier (CLSID) to the blocked list, or removes a CLSID from the list.
member.param: Member of the enumeration, specifying the type of object.
The CLSID to add or remove.
Specifies whether to add or remove the CSLID. If the value is TRUE, the method adds the CLSID to the blocked list. Otherwise, the method removes it from the list.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFPluginControl.SetPreferredClsid
member.summary: Adds a class identifier (CLSID) to the preferred list or removes a CLSID from the list.
member.param: Member of the enumeration, specifying the type of object.
The key name for the CLSID. For more information about the format of key names, see the Remarks section of .
The CLSID to add to the list. If this parameter is NULL, the key/value entry specified by the selector parameter is removed from the list.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Controls how media sources and transforms are enumerated in Microsoft Media Foundation.
To get a pointer to this interface, call .
